error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. She used 32 ounces on 8-ounce glasses, not 8.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 21
She has used 32 ounces on 8-ounce glasses because 4 x 8 = 32
She has used 30 ounces on the 5-ounce glasses because 6 x 5 = 30
She has used 38 ounces in total because 8 + 30 = <<8+30=38>>38
She has 84 ounces left because 122 - 38 = <<122-38=84>>84
She can fill fifteen four-ounce glasses because 84 / 4 = <<84/4=21>>21
